alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:50AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DELTA...WEST CENTRAL SCHOOLCRAFT AND SOUTH CENTRAL ALGER COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM EDT... At 150 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rapid River, or 15 miles north of Escanaba, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gladstone, Rapid River, Steuben, U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, Brampton, Ensign, Maplewood, Chicago Lake, Perkins, and Round Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Delta; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
